segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and it’s making me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t even notice the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and it’s going to be funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, completely clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t wait to see what happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and the boy is still reaching for more cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is going to slip any second now, and it’s going to be hilarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just waiting to explode into chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will manage to grab another cookie before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm compared to the madness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
